trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_SEQ_00<tab>Urianger wishes to take stock of the situation.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Urianger in Sinus Lacrimarum.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Livingway.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_TODO_03<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_TODO_04<tab>/rally the Loporrits.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Livingway.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_000<tab>I'm not wrong to call them that, am I? Friends.

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_VARSHAHNBIG_000_005<tab>Garlean technology shall enrich my people's lives and empower them to achieve great new feats. I am particularly eager to see what our alchemists are inspired to create.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_JULLUS_000_010<tab>Moments like these give me hope that we still have a place in this world...

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>Both Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han and Garlemald stand to benefit greatly from this agreement. It may well mark the beginning of a long and fruitful relationship.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_ALISAIE_000_020<tab>"Good friends,“ eh? And coming from her, you know she's not just saying it to be nice.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_030<tab>The moon... When Zenos brought me here, I remember feeling surprised that such a desolate place could exist in the Source.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_JULLUS_000_035<tab>You take care as well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>The trade agreement discussions do not require our input, so Alisaie and I are free to attend to the Tower of Babil without distractions.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>Leave the tower to us!
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_050<tab>This seal we mean to erect─I assume it won't hinder a half-voidsent like me from going in the other direction.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_URIANGER_000_055<tab>Y'shtola hath done well indeed to devise a seal in so short a time. 'Tis a testament to her ingenuity in times of need.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_ESTINIEN_000_060<tab>How did you fare with the preparations below?
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_NIDHANA_000_065<tab>So this is one of the brands that once imprisoned Zodiark... Were I to describe it to my comrades back home, I doubt my words could do it justice.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_WATCHEROFMOON_000_067<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>What aid I lend in restoring the brands is insignificant next to that which you and yours must accomplish.<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_WATCHEROFMOON_000_068<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>When my part is complete, I shall stand apart and observe, as I have ever done. For it was to you that Venat has entrusted the future.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_YSHTOLA_000_070<tab>Now then, to the matter at hand.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_YSHTOLA_000_071<tab>With the watcher's assistance, we shall reforge each of Zodiark's brands, and use them to erect a barrier capable of repelling voidsent.

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_YSHTOLA_000_072<tab>Yet though we expect it to be effective against larger beings on account of its original purpose, there is a chance it will allow lesser voidsent to slip through.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_YSHTOLA_000_073<tab>Therefore we shall require a second line of defense─and I believe the Loporrits' supporters would be suitable for this purpose.

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_YSHTOLA_000_074<tab>Urianger, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─the two of you have a strong rapport with our lunar allies. I would have you meet with Livingway in Bestways Burrow and provide any assistance they require.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_075<tab>I will join you. As a voidsent, my knowledge may be of use.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_YSHTOLA_000_076<tab>An excellent idea. In the meantime, the rest of us will see to reforging the brands. I will send word when we have finished─pray do the same.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_080<tab>What are these...<var 1A 02 /var>things<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_URIANGER_000_085<tab>Livingway, I trust thou hast been well?
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_YSHTOLA_000_087<tab>First, we shall see to this brand.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_ESTINIEN_000_088<tab>We have matters here well in hand. Go, meet with the Loporrits.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_NIDHANA_000_089<tab>We will have the brands in working order before you know it!
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_LIVINGWAY_000_090<tab>There you are! Y'shtola has apprised me of your present undertaking.

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_LIVINGWAY_000_091<tab>I understand that she wishes to deploy our pride and joy─the veritable carrots of our eye─our unrivaled combat supporters─as a precautionary measure in case this voidsent containment seal of hers proves lacking.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_LIVINGWAY_000_092<tab>As we speak, my fellows are rounding up what units they can, and will bring them to the northeast corner in short order. Please wait there.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_100<tab>Despite their bestial appearance, these creatures are highly intelligent. And much like you and yours, they take pleasure in helping others...
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_JULLUS_000_105<tab>Ever grateful am I for the Loporrits' irrepressible compulsion to help.

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_SYSTEM_000_108<tab>The Loporrits' eyes twinkle with anticipation as they await your buoyant extollation. To wit, they yearn for you to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> their spirits.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_110<tab>I wonder if these creatures also once existed on the void's moon... But even if they did, they must all be voidsent by now.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_JULLUS_000_115<tab>Though I fear my laudations will leave them wanting, I shall do mine utmost to rally the Loporrits.

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_LIVINGWAY_000_120<tab>To be clear, we will always do everything within our power to aid the people of Etheirys. As I'm sure you'll agree, though, it doesn't hurt to have a little encouragement!

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_MAPPINGWAY_000_130<tab>The repairs? Oh, they proceed apace, I assure you! But...they might go even more swiftly if you were to spur us on. <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> us, as it were... <wink> <wink>
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_SLEEPINGWAY_000_131<tab><yawn> <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> the engineers... E-Enga...ge...

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_SINGINGWAY_000_132<tab>Oh, what could be more splendiferous than to repair our supporters under the loving gaze of people from Etheirys! Nothing, I tell you! Nothing! Save for one such individual to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> us while we go about it, but a humble Loporrit can only dream...

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_GROWINGWAY_000_133<tab>N-Never fear, we shall ensure the supporters are ready for any voidsent brazen enough to slip through! And if they seem to struggle, we'll <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> them! Or at least we would, if someone were kind enough to demonstrate...

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_SYSTEM_100_133<tab>The Loporrits are doing their best to meet your expectations, and it is only fair that you return the favor. Shower them with all the encouragement you can muster and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> their spirits.
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_MAPPINGWAY_000_134<tab>What a marvelous feeling! There's nothing like wild gesticulations of encouragement to fire you up!
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_SLEEPINGWAY_000_135<tab>What!? Engage, engage!

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_SLEEPINGWAY_000_136<tab>Oh, sorry, I was in the midst of... Forgive me. The sight of precision parts is strangely soothing and sleep...inducing... But...I'll try to...keep moving... <yawn>
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_SINGINGWAY_000_137<tab>Hum hum-hummm～♪ With you cheering me on, I can do naught less than my very best!

TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_GROWINGWAY_000_138<tab>Oooh, thank you very, very much! You don't know how uplifting it is to have you encouraging us! I mean, uh, showing us the proper technique so we may keep our supporters operating at peak efficiency!
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_MAPPINGWAY_000_140<tab>Forget two─at this rate, we'll finish in a carrot and a half!
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_SLEEPINGWAY_000_145<tab>Total...annih...ilation...of...voidsent...
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_SINGINGWAY_000_150<tab>Next to the maintenance of the atmospheric circulation system, making adjustments to these supporters is as easy as changing your socks!
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_GROWINGWAY_000_155<tab>Overclocking to increase maximum output... For the sake of the people of Etheirys, we cannot settle for “good enough”!
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_LIVINGWAY_000_160<tab>My, everyone is in high spirits indeed!
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_LIVINGWAY_000_161<tab>Thanks to your encouragement, we'll have the supporters up and running again in no time at all!
TEXT_AKTKMK106_04740_LIVINGWAY_000_162<tab>Pray attend to your remaining busywork, and leave the deployment of our new and improved voidsent slaughter-bots to us!
